SEARCH

Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseConnection
    Helper class containing a function to get a postgres Connection based on authentication credentials in this class.
    Doctor
    A child class of User which also contains a medical license number, and a medical specialization.
    DoctorPortalDao
    Data access object for CRUD operations involving doctor users, their patient users, and their patients HealthData.
    HealthData
    Class which represents a single recording of a user's health status, including weight, height, step count, heart rate, and hemoglobin A1C.
    HealthDataDao
    Data Access Object class which facilitates the creation, modification, and retrieval of HealthData stored in the database.
    HealthMonitoringApp
    Class which contains the main() method for this project.
    MedicineReminder
    A class for medicine reminders, which include the prescription and the time period during which the prescription should be taken.
    MedicineReminderManager
    A class which can store multiple MedicineReminders, as well as performing CRUD operations on the database.
    RecommendationSystem
    A class containing a static methods which will analyze a HealthData instance and offer suggestions based on the information in the HealthData.
    User
    A universal user class.
    UserDao
    A Data Access Object which interfaces with the Postgres database.
